variations.description: For the next 10 seconds, all damage dealt to allies are redirected to Luan, who also gains a Blessing. Blessing: Reduces damage taken by 20% and restores 6% of max Health per second.
For the next 10 seconds, all damage dealt to allies are redirected to Luan, who also gains a Blessing. Blessing: Reduces damage taken by 20% and restores 7% of max Health per second.
For the next 10 seconds, all damage dealt to allies are redirected to Luan, who also gains a Blessing. Blessing: Reduces damage taken by 20% and restores 8% of max Health per second.
For the next 10 seconds, all damage dealt to allies are redirected to Luan, who also gains a Blessing. Blessing: Reduces damage taken by 20% and restores 9% of max Health per second.
For the next 10 seconds, all damage dealt to allies are redirected to Luan, who also gains a Blessing. Blessing: Reduces damage taken by 20% and restores 10% of max Health per second.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 270% of ATK to all enemies and dispels their buffs. Also applies a stack of Soul Burn to the targets for 8s. Soul Burn: Reduces Magic DEF by 100. Can stack up to 5 times.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 315% of ATK to all enemies and dispels their buffs. Also applies a stack of Soul Burn to the targets for 8s. Soul Burn: Reduces Magic DEF by 100. Can stack up to 5 times.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 360% of ATK to all enemies and dispels their buffs. Also applies a stack of Soul Burn to the targets for 8s. Soul Burn: Reduces Magic DEF by 100. Can stack up to 5 times.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 405% of ATK to all enemies and dispels their buffs. Also applies a stack of Soul Burn to the targets for 8s. Soul Burn: Reduces Magic DEF by 100. Can stack up to 5 times.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 450% of ATK to all enemies and dispels their buffs. Also applies a stack of Soul Burn to the targets for 8s. Soul Burn: Reduces Magic DEF by 100. Can stack up to 5 times.

Revives automatically after taking lethal damage. Increases ATK, Physical DEF and Magic DEF by 15% and gains Rebirth effect for 10s. Can only trigger once per combat. Rebirth: Restores 5% of max Health per second.
Revives automatically after death. Increases ATK, Physical DEF and Magic DEF by 30% and restores 10% of max Health per second for 10s. Can only trigger once per combat.
